import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" const Edit = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ phone: '', message: '', status: '' }) const navigate = useNavigate() const { id } = useParams() const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setData(data => ({ ...data, [name]: value })) } const updateMessage = async () => { console.log('yo') } return(
